name: Facebook Clean 2014 v1.7 (ad-blocker)
description:
This userstyle will hide all the annoying ads from the right-side panel and a few other places:

trending ads
suggested pages
suggested games
suggested friends
suggested lists
top banner on lists
game ads on top of chat window

works in conjunction with other themes
additional_info:
v1.0 24th Dec 2013 - release version
v1.1 25th Dec 2013 - profile ads removed
v1.2 23th Jan 2014 - hide "trending" ads
v1.3 08th Feb 2014 - hide list suggestions
v1.4 16th Mar 2014 - hide lists top banner
v1.5 02nd Apr 2014 - hide suggested games
v1.6 14th May 2014 - hide recommended games 
v1.7 05th Jul 2014 - fix bug profile cover, removed game ads top of chat window
